conversion_verification.notes: Second image is a true cutaway 3D model: extruded walls with thickness, visible top/side faces, angled/isometric view, and ceiling removed exposing interior volumes.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Strong wall extrusion, readable corners, clear floor-vs-wall separation, and clean cutaway; minor softness in corner crispness and some simplified junctions.

geometric_accuracy.notes: Overall room count and adjacency match (left bedroom, central bath/core, right bedroom, living area, kitchen/dining). Minor proportional drift in some spaces and openings; some window/door placement appears simplified vs plan.

interior_elements.notes: Major furniture and fixtures are present (beds, sofa, dining table, kitchen counters/appliances, bathroom fixtures). Some items are simplified and a few placements/scales do not perfectly mirror the 2D symbols.

visual_clarity.notes: Clean render with distinguishable walls/floors/openings and good interior visibility; consistent materials. Slight ambiguity in some openings due to uniform wall color and soft shadows.

detected_errors.description: Some doors/windows appear simplified or not perfectly aligned to the exact 2D locations/orientations.
A few furniture pieces differ in exact placement/scale compared to the 2D plan symbols (likely simplification rather than missing rooms).
Uniform wall material and soft lighting slightly reduce readability of a few wall/opening edges.

summary: A clearly valid 3D cutaway conversion with strong layout fidelity and complete major spaces, with only minor mismatches in openings and some simplified furniture/proportions.
